main_definition: The art or practice of designing and constructing buildings, as well as the study of the form and style of these structures.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Design principles of an architectural plan
meanings_and_examples.example: The architecture of this building features clean lines and a modern design.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An organized, detailed set of rules or structure in various fields
meanings_and_examples.example: Computer architecture refers to the way computers are designed, including hardware components and software organization.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The study of buildings and their historical development
meanings_and_examples.example: Historical architectural studies examine how ancient structures were constructed and what they tell us about past civilizations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The overall appearance or aesthetic appeal of something
meanings_and_examples.example: This website has great architecture with an elegant, minimalist design.
